name: Nodejs with Angularjs
body:
# NodeJS-with-AngularJS
# Registration

Step1:
Git clone https://github.com/suneel2you/NodeJS-with-AngularJS.git

Step2:
install node 

Step3:
Install npm files

Step4: 
run the main file
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
